channel.title: Teleportation Anims/Gfx [Dementhium][639]
channel.description:
I've added an animation and graphic for each command teleport but, what occurs is it teleports you to said location then performs the teleport so for example, it would take you to mage bank if you do ::mb and since i set it to be the lunar anim/gfx it will do it but it just happends once you tele there rather then, happen then teleport you there.. is like a delay think i can do which makes it teleport 5 seconds after or like a wait; or something?
Dementhium 639 Based source.
Thank you to all future Helpers.

item.title: Teleportation Anims/Gfx [Dementhium][639]
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.
item.description:
@M.I.A wrote:

Will do, thank you for your consideration.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleportation Anims/Gfx [Dementhium][639]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

M.I.A.:

I did… but it would start the anim in the position than teleport than finishing going up rather than finishing the emote and then teleporting…

Not sure how in higher revision servers, but in lower revision servers there are event handlers. Look around for something like that and just make a timer then like you said in your OP.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleportation Anims/Gfx [Dementhium][639]
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.

item.title: Teleportation Anims/Gfx [Dementhium][639]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

If it’s teleporting you and then performing the animation that’s because you put the animation after the teleport. Simply put the animation before the teleport location is called.

Read full topic
